subject: Question on settings
description_text:
Hello.  I bought the Simsonn pro x pedals.  And I was wondering if you had any insight on what the settings should be for iracing on dirt ? It seems like ever since I’ve had these pedals.  I have actually lost speed.  It’s like I cannot get any forward bite out of the car.  So I was wondering if possibly I need to change something in my settings for the pedals ? Any help would be greatly appreciated!  Thank you so much! 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi darrell arnold,     You can refer to this to adjust the brake damping, pedal force, and pedal travel. The throttle pedal also supports travel adjustment. Please analyze the issue based on your actual driving experience, and then fine-tune the pedals accordingly to achieve the feel and feedback that best match your driving style.
